articles.description: We've tracked down some of the best demos in the Steam Summer Game Fest. These include the fabulous Ultrakill from New Blood Interactive.
articles.content: The Steam Game Festival: Summer Edition is live right now as part of Not E3 online events, and it includes demos for dozens of unreleased games. If youve never been to the Electronic Entertainment Ex… [+2777 chars]
